mapper.select: SELECT b.boardNo, b.boardTitle, b.boardContent, b.boardRegDate, CASE WHEN b.userNo IS NOT NULL THEN up.nickname WHEN b.comNo IS NOT NULL THEN c.comName ELSE '알 수 없음' END AS writerName FROM board b LEFT JOIN userProfiles up ON b.userNo = up.userNo LEFT JOIN company c ON b.comNo = c.comNo ORDER BY b.boardRegDate DESC LIMIT #{limit} OFFSET #{offset};

SELECT b.boardNo, b.boardTitle, b.userNo, b.comNo, b.boardContent, b.boardRegDate, CASE WHEN b.userNo IS NOT NULL THEN up.nickname WHEN b.comNo IS NOT NULL THEN c.comName ELSE '알 수 없음' END AS writerName FROM board b LEFT JOIN userProfiles up ON b.userNo = up.userNo LEFT JOIN company c ON b.comNo = c.comNo WHERE b.boardNo = #{boardNo};

SELECT c.commentNo, c.boardNo, c.userNo, c.comNo, c.comment, c.commentRegDate, CASE WHEN c.userNo IS NOT NULL THEN up.nickname WHEN c.comNo IS NOT NULL THEN com.comName ELSE '알 수 없음' END AS writerName FROM comment c LEFT JOIN userProfiles up ON c.userNo = up.userNo LEFT JOIN company com ON c.comNo = com.comNo WHERE c.boardNo = #{boardNo} ORDER BY c.commentRegDate ASC;
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board (userNo, comNo, boardTitle, boardContent, boardRegDate) VALUES (#{userNo}, #{comNo}, #{boardTitle}, #{boardContent}, NOW());
INSERT INTO comment (boardNo, userNo, comNo, comment, commentRegDate) VALUES (#{boardNo}, #{userNo}, #{comNo}, #{comment}, NOW());
